name: Loading Process!
description:
Loading Process! Load those boxes...

Press the button written on the box to load it on the right conveyor belt. Try not to miss any boxes!

SymbolButton/Keyboard KeyLeft ArrowRight ArrowUp ArrowDown ArrowC or ZX or V

This game was created from scratch in 3 hours for Trijam #176 using Pico-8, because Pico-8 is awesome!
